song_name: Yoshimi Battles the Pink Robots Part 1
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Yoshimi Battles the Pink Robots Part 1 has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion:
Yoshimi Battles the Pink Robots Part 1 is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music.
